title: Beginning iOS 6 Development
subtitle: Exploring the iOS SDK
authors: David Mark, Jack Nutting, Jeff LaMarche, Fredrik Olsson
desc: There's coverage of brand new technologies, with chapters on storyboards and iCloud, for example, as well as significant updates to existing chapters to bring them in line with all the changes that came with the iOS 6 SDK. You'll have everything you need to create your very own apps for the latest i...
